attributes.action: Strengthen marriage by banning all sex outside of marriage
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government to bring the law in line with what the Holy Bible God's holy law says on sex.  Namely to make all sex outside of marriage between one man and one woman illegal.

The vile gay marriage act and equality acts should be repealed and it should be made quite clear that any sexual activity outside of marriage as defined in the bible will not be tolerated.

In practice this means outlawing the following:-

Casual sex
Co-habitation between a man and a woman
Adultery
Homosexuality
Lesbianism
Single parents (except due to the death of the spouse)

This will have an effect of strengthening the family and helping to end poverty, crime, heartbreak and children robbed of their childhood be a broken home.
